feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the hero photo removal feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of main frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/CongratsPage.tsx: Composes the hero, highlights, aircraft photo sections, and footer inside ThemeShell.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright text and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Aircraf: Section displaying a styled aircraft photo with header and caption.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with congratulatory text and Boeing 737 and Air India Express info.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Interactive highlights grid where each item opens a surprise modal.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseModal.ts: Reusable modal showing an image and message using shadcn dialog components.
frontend/src/components/ThemeShell.tsx: Layout wrapper applying repeating airplane-pattern background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applies base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, known issues, and configuration for the themed congratulatory website.
